sides.name: Garlic Bread
sides.description: Toasted bread brushed with garlic butter and sprinkled with herbs.

sides.name: Roasted Vegetables
sides.description: A mix of seasonal vegetables roasted with olive oil and herbs.

sides.name: Fries
sides.description: Crispy golden fries seasoned with salt and served with ketchup.

sides.description: Creamy mashed potatoes made with butter and milk.
